thread.section_title: Gardens NYC-an Affinia hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect family fall-out base
thread.title_full: Perfect family fall-out base - Review of Gardens NYC-an Affinia hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Gertjan B
title: Perfect family fall-out base
text:
Located in quiet area with excellent subway connection to all the sites and walking distance from Central Park. Great location for a family vacation, with modest kitchen available.
There was a small hiccup with our reservation, but Pedro Hilario took really good care of us, minimizing any inconvenience.
Emporium Foods grocery story nearby if you are on a budget. But don't miss out on all the wonderful food NYC has on offer!
Room Tip: Apartment suite allows kids to sleep while parents stay up a bit later See more room tips
